title: Today I learnt why people ban yas
body:
I played blind pick
because you’re forced to play blind pick in oce before 2pm
and I decided to play mid because I was bored
then there was a yas
I died instantly
yas snowballed
another champ to add to my always ban list

replies.body:
Yasuo is a strong viable champion, alot of people who are comfortable with him use him in many different playstyle, I'm fully aware it's a popular pick as well as the most bans in any game queues. I'm not quite sure where you heading in this conversation but many people will either be good with him or pretty much knyhow to counter pick him. Hope this helps with answering your question. 

Cheers!
